content: knit this beautifully textured cardigan using worsted weight yarn and the delicate dot stitch the light dotty cardigan is a gorgeous oversized drop-sleeve cardigan that looks so stylish with its ribbed collar cozy pockets and lovely texture worsted weight level 4 yarn called color theory by lion brand yarn is used sizing is included for small/medium large/xl 2x/3x & 4x/5x and final dimensions are as follows bust 50 58 66 74 to fit actual bust of 32-38 40-46 48-54 56-62 length 27 28 29 30 armhole 8 5 9 5 10 5 11 5 the number of skeins of color theory yarn required are small/medium - 7 skeins l/xl - 8 skeins 2x/3x - 9 skeins and 4x/5x - 10 skeins the sample is in the ivory colorway and i am 5 6 for height reference wearing size s/m the **free** knit pattern can be found ***here*** 1 note that the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 10 pages including the cover page the original **dotty cardigan** using bulky level 5 yarn can be found *** here 2 *** 1 https //www allaboutami com/light-dotty-cardigan/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dotty-cardigan
